name: RabbitMQ Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 RabbitMQ Trigger 节点。主要用于: Listens to RabbitMQ messages

queue.name: queue
queue.description: The name of the queue to read from
queue.natural_language_description: 参数名: Queue / Topic | 作用: The name of the queue to read from

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: assertExchange (值: None) - Whether to assert the exchange exists before sending
assertQueue (值: None) - Whether to assert the queue exists before sending
autoDelete (值: None) - Whether the queue will be deleted when the number of consumers drops to zero
binding (值: None) - Add binding to queu
contentIsBinary (值: None) - Whether to save the content as binary
acknowledge (值: None) - When to acknowledge the message
durable (值: None) - Whether the queue will survive broker restarts
exclusive (值: None) - Whether to scope the queue to the connection
jsonParseBody (值: None) - Whether to parse the body to an object
onlyContent (值: None) - Whether to return only the content property
parallelMessages (值: None) - Max number of executions at a time. Use -1 for no limit.

laterMessageNode.displayName: To delete an item from the queue, insert a RabbitMQ node later in the workflow and use the 'Delete from queue' operation
laterMessageNode.name: laterMessageNode
laterMessageNode.natural_language_description: 参数名: To delete an item from the queue, insert a RabbitMQ node later in the workflow and use the 'Delete from queue' operation
